item.title: Purpose of Pain from Incurable Internal Organ Conditions is to Warn of Death Danger and Trigger Preparations, Manchester University Researchers Find
item.description: Scientists at Manchester University have published a groundbreaking study that reveals the possible purpose of the pain experienced by individuals suffering from incurable conditions affecting internal organs. According to their research, the pain serves as a warning sign for an impending death danger and a red flag for an adult organism to make adequate preparations. The study was conducted over a five-year period, and the team was led by Professor Anne-Marie Robertson of the Department of Genetics and Cellular Biology.
